Your XRPL Dictionary! ğŸ¾âœ¨

New to crypto? Confused by all the jargon? Mewâ€™s got you covered! ğŸ˜ºğŸ’¡

Explore key blockchain & XRPL terms in a fun & simple way! From DeFi & AMM Pools to Smart Contracts & Rug Pulls, Mew helps you trade & explore with confidence! ğŸš€

ğŸ”¹ Click below to learn more! ğŸ“ğŸ¾

ğŸ•³ï¸ BlackHoling an account means permanently disabling its ability to send transactions. Any tokens in a blackholed wallet are gone foreverâ€”just like a burn! ğŸ”¥ This ensures no one can ever access or recover the funds. ğŸ•³ï¸ğŸ˜¸
ğŸ”¥ Burning tokens means sending them to a blackholed address or an inaccessible wallet. This removes them from circulation permanently, reducing supply and potentially increasing scarcity. ğŸš€
âš¡ Automated Market Maker (AMM) Pools allow users to provide liquidity and earn fees by letting others trade against their funds! A great way to boost early liquidity for new tokens! ğŸ¦ğŸ’§

ğŸš€ For new projects, burning tokens & using AMM pools can help establish trust & liquidity. ğŸ”¥ Burning team-held tokens shows commitment, while AMM pools ensure active trading & fair price discovery! ğŸ’°
ğŸ¦¾ DeFi is the future of financeâ€”no banks, no middlemen, just you and the blockchain! It allows users to lend, borrow, trade, and earn interest on crypto assets without traditional finance.
âœ… Staking lets you lock up tokens to earn passive rewards! A way to support networks and earn extra crypto while holding your assets.
ğŸŒ± Yield farming lets users provide liquidity to DeFi pools and earn rewards in return! Higher risk, higher potential rewards!
ğŸ¦ Crypto lending lets users borrow against their holdings or lend assets to earn interest! DeFi makes finance borderless and permissionless!
ğŸ’± Decentralized Exchange (DEXs) Trade directly from your wallet with complete control over your assets! No sign-ups, no middlemenâ€”just blockchain-powered trading!
ğŸ¦ Centralized exchanges (CEXs) require sign-ups and hold your funds, offering more convenience but less control. Examples: Binance, Coinbase, Kraken.
ğŸ’§ Liquidity keeps DEXs running smoothly! Liquidity pools (LPs) let users deposit token pairs to enable trading and earn a share of the fees!
âš ï¸ Slippage happens when a trade executes at a different price than expected! Higher liquidity = lower slippage. Always check slippage settings before trading!
ğŸ¦ Stablecoins are cryptocurrencies pegged to stable assets like USD or gold. They reduce volatility and are widely used in DeFi. Examples: USDT, USDC.
ğŸ˜¿ A risk of liquidity farming! Happens when token prices change after you provide liquidity, reducing potential profits. Always DYOR before providing liquidity!
